      • createCustomer

        public void createCustomer(Response response)
        Description copied from interface: Createable
        Populates the response object with the results from the createCustomer command. The side effect is the customer is created on the ILS.
        Specified by:

        Description copied from class: CustomerQueryable
        Tests if the pin supplied from the web site matches the user's account pin.
        Specified by:
        isAuthorized in class CustomerQueryable
        Parameters:
        suppliedPin - - String data used to test against Customer pin.
